Fast_Healing.help: You heal Hit Points at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Reconstruction.help: Through perfect control of your body, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. The effects of Reconstruction also leaves you resistant to Toxic damage for a while. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} heals you for {Damage} hit points!

Quick_Recovery.help: You recover Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Instant_Regeneration.help: When you activate this power, you can regenerate your wounds so fast, you practically absorb some of the inflicted damage. This grants absorption over time while it's active. Recharge: Fast
Instant_Regeneration.attackerHit: You activate {PowerName} and start to Regenerate at an astonishing rate.

Dismiss_Pain.help: Using ancient techniques, you can make yourself more resilient to pain. Thus, you can take more damage before being defeated. This power is always on.
Dismiss_Pain.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.

Integration.help: You can Integrate your mind and body, making you resistant to Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilization effects, as well as increase your regeneration rate, for as long as you can keep this toggle power active. Recharge: Fast
Integration.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize), +Regeneration
Integration.attackerHit: You are now highly resistant to Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep and Knockback.

Resilience.help: You are more Resilient. This power allows you to build up a resistance to Disorientation effects. You tend not to get Disoriented, and if you do, it wears off quickly. This resistance to Disorientation gets stronger as you go up in level. Resilience also grants some resistance to all types of damage. This power is always on.

Second_Wind.help: When you use this power you will recover a percentage of your missing health, in addition to increasing your maximum hit points in a similar way. The less hit points you have left, the more powerful this effect will be. Should you fall in battle, you can use this power at its maximum strength to stand up and fight again. If used while defeated, you will be protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds and immune to most damage for 15 seconds. Although this power cost no endurance, it will take drain 10 endurance if used while still standing.
Second_Wind.targetHelp: You have reached within yourself and found a second wind to keep on fighting.
Second_Wind.attackerHit: You have reached within yourself and found a second wind to keep on fighting.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases your hit points by {Damage}!
Your {PowerName} increases your hit points by {Damage}!
Your {PowerName} heals you for {Damage} hit points!

Moment_of_Glory.help: When you activate this power, you gain Resistance and Defense to all damage types except Psionics, recover Endurance more quickly, and are highly resistant to Knock Back, Sleep, Disorient, Immobilization, and Hold effects. Recharge: Very Long
Moment_of_Glory.shortHelp: Self +Res(All DMG but Psionics, Knock Back, Repel, Stun, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize), +DEF(All DMG but Psionics), +Recovery
